thread.title: Enjoyable stay
thread.title_full: Enjoyable stay - Review of NYLO New York City, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: 880colinf
title: Enjoyable stay
text:
Second stay at the NYLO - staff, especially cleaning staff pleasant and helpful. Nice ambience - a cross between boutique and informal.
WiFi could do with a boost - kept getting disconnected. Bed really comfortable! Pleasant atmosphere throughout hotel. Lobby area allows for lounging, playing chess, watching TV or setting up your laptop and working in one of the comfortable seating areas adjacent to the small bar with cafe style chairs and tables.
